Package org.soen6441.model.orders

Class Bomb

java.lang.Object
org.soen6441.model.orders.Bomb
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Order
public class Bomb
extends java.lang.Object
implements Order
Bomb class implements the Order interface and overrides the execute method. The object of this class is created when a player issues Bomb order.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) Country d_Country
    The country to be bombed.
    (package private) int d_NoOfArmies
    Half the number of armies on the country that is bombed.
    (package private) Player d_Player
    The bomb order issuing player
    (package private) Player d_PlayerBombed
    The player who is affected by the bomb order.

    • Bomb

      public Bomb​(Player p_Player, Country p_TempCountry)
      Constructor which is called when a new object of Bomb class is created.
      Parameters:
      p_Player - The player who issues the bomb order.
      p_TempCountry - The country on which the bomb to be dropped, if valid.

  • Method Details

    • setBombedPlayer

      private void setBombedPlayer()
      This method sets the player whose country is going to be bombed.

    • execute

      public void execute()
      This method checks the validity of the Bomb order and execute if it passes. If the order is valid, it will half the number of armies on the country which is bombed. This method removes the bomb card from the player's card list so that can't be used again.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Order

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      This method checks the validity of the Bomb order. It returns false if coutry is owned by negotiated player, player does not have bomb card. It also returns false if country is owned by the same player who issues the bomb order. it returns false if country to be bombed is not a neighbour country.
      Returns:
      true if Bomb order is valid, else false.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      This method returns the player who issues the Bomb order
      Returns:
      The player who issues the bomb order

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer​(Player d_Player)
      Sets the player who issues the bomb order.
      Parameters:
      d_Player - Player who issues the bomb order.
